statements: SELECT * FROM books_sales;
SELECT book_title, price, discount FROM books_sales ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT author, revenue FROM books_sales WHERE sold_quantity > 100 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT book_title, author, price, discount, revenue FROM books_sales WHERE price < 20 AND discount >= 0.5;
SELECT book_title, author, sold_quantity, revenue FROM books_sales WHERE author = 'John Doe' AND revenue > 1000 ORDER BY revenue DESC, sold_quantity ASC;
SELECT book_title, author, price, sold_quantity FROM books_sales WHERE price > 50 AND discount < 0.1 ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT * FROM books_sales WHERE author = 'Stephen King' ORDER BY sold_quantity DESC
SELECT book_title, price, revenue FROM books_sales WHERE sold_quantity >= 1000 AND revenue > 50000 ORDER BY revenue DESC, price ASC
SELECT * FROM books_sales WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND author LIKE 'J.K. Rowling%' ORDER BY author ASC, price DESC, sold_quantity DESC
SELECT book_title, author, discount, revenue FROM books_sales WHERE discount >= 0.1 ORDER BY book_title ASC
SELECT * FROM books;
SELECT book_title, author, price FROM books WHERE price > 50;
SELECT book_title, author, price, revenue FROM books ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT book_title, SUM(quantity) AS total_sold FROM books JOIN sales ON books.book_id = sales.book_id GROUP BY book_title ORDER BY total_sold DESC;
SELECT book_title, author, price FROM books WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY author DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE quantity >= 5 AND total_amount < 100 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT book_title, author, price, revenue FROM books WHERE revenue > 1000 AND price < 50;
SELECT DISTINCT author FROM books WHERE author LIKE 'J%';
SELECT book_title, author, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM books b INNER JOIN sales s ON b.book_id = s.book_id GROUP BY book_title, author ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM books WHERE price > 50;
SELECT title, author, price FROM books ORDER BY author DESC;
SELECT book_id, title, author, price, revenue FROM books WHERE revenue IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY sale_date;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM books WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY author ASC;
SELECT title, author, price FROM books WHERE discount > 0.2 AND revenue IS NOT NULL ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT author FROM books WHERE title LIKE '%Harry Potter%';
SELECT * FROM sales JOIN books ON sales.book_id = books.book_id WHERE sales.quantity > 10 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NULL ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM books WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT title, author, price FROM books WHERE revenue < 1000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT title, author, price, discount FROM books WHERE author LIKE '%Rowling%' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE phone IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name;
SELECT * FROM books
SELECT title, author, price FROM books WHERE price > 50
SELECT name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT book_id, title, author FROM books WHERE author LIKE '%Rowling%'
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM orders WHERE quantity >= 3 ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT * FROM books;
SELECT book_title, author_name, genre FROM books WHERE genre = 'Mystery';
SELECT book_title, author_name, price, revenue FROM books ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT author_name, nationality, birth_year FROM authors WHERE nationality = 'American';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT book_id, book_title, author_name, genre, price FROM books WHERE genre = 'Mystery' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT author_name, nationality, birth_year FROM authors WHERE nationality = 'American' ORDER BY birth_year;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, book_id, quantity, price FROM order_items WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY price ASC;
